featured.text: Your dog could fall into one of nine categories: Ace, Stargazer, Maverick, Charmer, Socialite, Protodog, Einstein, Expert, or Renaissance Dog.

definition.zh_def: 仰望星空的人；天文愛好者。
definition.en_def: A person who gazes at the stars, often for enjoyment or study.
definition.example: The stargazer spent the night on the hill, marveling at the constellations.
